column5: lol check this out.  to funny!     My link
ya gotta wonder what that bear said to himself !!!!! of crap!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
That guy waited a lot longer to open his mouth than I would have.
I thought when the bear was reaching the top he was going to kick it in the head.... that video was awsome..............
I would have asked it where it learned to climb a ladder, after I screamed like a 4 year old school girl...
That was awesome, but I'd probably be at the top of the tree at the point where he asked him what he was doing
that is an awesome video...but it makes me wonder if the bear is actually a pet and they were merely playing hide and seek...
It would be climbing up as I would be jumping off.
